entries.label: [] ClaudeCode1: MCP Server: t2i-kam
entries.taskName:
ClaudeCode1: MCP Server: t2i-kamui-fal-nano-banana-pro
Description: Nano Banana Pro Text-to-Image - Gemini 2.5 Flash Image model for high-quality image generation. Generate images from text prompts with support for customizable parameters including prompt, number of images, aspect ratio (21:9, 16:9, 3:2, 4:3, 5:4, 1:1, 4:5, 3:4, 2:3, 9:16), output format (jpeg, png, webp), sync mode, and limit generations. Perfect for creative image generation, concept art, and visual content creation via Kamui Code   

  

  - : 2,697m
  - :  36.7583,  137.7525

  ---
  20251124
